member.name: P:GridCoinDotNet.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:GridCoinDotNet.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:GridCoinDotNet.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.Base58.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a base-58 string to a byte array, returning null if it wasn't valid.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.PublicKey.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Constructor that takes a byte array of 33 or 65 bytes representing a public key.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.PublicKey.validatePoint
member.summary: Returns true if the point coordinates satisfy the elliptic curve equation.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.PublicKey.ComputePublicKey
member.summary: Virtual method to compute public key on demand when doing so is expensive. Not used if we are handed a public key through the constructor, but this is used if a descendant class (e.g. KeyPair) has a private key and the only way to know the public key is to compute it.

member.name: P:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.PublicKey.PublicKeyBytes
member.summary: Returns the public key bytes. This will return 65 bytes for an uncompressed public key or 33 bytes for a compressed public key.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.PublicKey.ComputeHash160
member.summary: Computes the Hash160 of the public key upon demand.

member.name: P:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.PublicKey.PublicKeyHex
member.summary: Hexadecimal representation of public key. Each byte is 2 hex digits, uppercase, delimited with spaces.

member.name: T:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.PublicKey
member.summary: Bitcoin address extended to include knowledge of public key.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.MiniKeyPair.CreateRandom(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new random MiniKey. Entropy is taken from .NET's SecureRandom, the system clock, and any optionally provided salt.

member.name: P:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.MiniKeyPair.PrivateKey
member.summary: Returns the private key in the most preferred display format for the type.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.MiniKeyPair.IsValidMiniKey(System.String)
member.summary: Returns 1 if candidate is a valid Mini Private Key per rules described in Bitcoin Wiki article "Mini private key format". Zero or negative indicates not a valid Mini Private Key. -1 means well formed but fails typo check.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.AddressBase.#ctor(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Constructs a Bitcoin address from a 20 byte array representing a Hash160. If 21 bytes are provided, the extra byte denotes address type.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.AddressBase.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.Byte)
member.summary: Constructs a Bitcoin address from a 20 byte array representing a Hash160, and also denoting a specific address type.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.AddressBase.#ctor(GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.AddressBase,System.Byte)
member.summary: Allows calculation of address with a different AddressType

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.AddressBase.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs an Address from an address string

member.name: P:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.AddressBase.AddressType
member.summary: Returns the address type. For example, 0=Bitcoin

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.AddressBase.ComputeHash160
member.summary: Overridden in descendant classes allowing Hash160 to be computed on an as-needed basis (since it's CPU-costly if it comes from a private key)

member.name: P:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.AddressBase.Hash160
member.summary: Returns a copy of the 20-byte Hash160 of the Bitcoin address

member.name: P:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.AddressBase.AddressBase58
member.summary: Get the Bitcoin address in Base58 format as it would be seen by the user.

member.name: T:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.AddressBase
member.summary: Represents a single Bitcoin address, assumes knowledge only of a Hash160.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.Util.Base58Trim(System.String)
member.summary: Trims whitespace from within and outside string. Whitespace is anything non-alphanumeric that may have been inserted into a string.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.Util.Base58CheckToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a base-58 string to a byte array, checking the checksum, and returning null if it wasn't valid. Appending "?" to the end of the string skips the checksum calculation, but still strips the four checksum bytes from the result.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.Util.HexStringToBytes(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts a hex string to bytes. Hex chars can optionally be space-delimited, otherwise, any two contiguous hex chars are considered to be a byte. If testingForValidHex==true, then if any invalid characters are found, the function returns null instead of bytes.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.Util.CloneByteArray(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Extension for cloning a byte array

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.Util.CloneByteArray(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Extension for cloning a portion of a byte array

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.KeyPair.CreateFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new key pair using the SHA256 hash of a given string as the private key.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.KeyPair.Create(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Byte)
member.summary: Creates a new random key pair, using a user-provided string to add entropy to the SecureRandom generator provided by the .NET Framework.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.KeyPair.#ctor(Org.BouncyCastle.Math.BigInteger,System.Boolean,System.Byte)
member.summary: Generates a KeyPair using a BigInteger as a private key. BigInteger is checked for appropriate range.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.KeyPair.#ctor(System.Byte[],System.Boolean,System.Byte)
member.summary: Create a Bitcoin address from a 32-byte private key

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.KeyPair.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Byte)
member.summary: Create a Bitcoin address from a key represented in a string.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.KeyPair.constructWithKey(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs the object with string key, returning any intended exception as a string.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.KeyPair.validateRange
member.summary: Returns error message in a string if private key is not within the valid range (2 ... N-1)

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.KeyPair.IsValidPrivateKey(System.String)
member.summary: Returns true if a given string can be turned into a private key.

member.name: P:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.KeyPair.PrivateKeyBytes
member.summary: Provides access to the private key.

member.name: M:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.KeyPair.ComputePublicKey
member.summary: Computes the public key from the private key.

member.summary: Returns the private key as a string of hexadecimal digits.

member.name: P:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.KeyPair.PrivateKey
member.summary: Returns the private key in the most preferred display format for the type.

member.name: P:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.KeyPair.PrivateKeyBase58
member.summary: Getter: Returns the private key, either unencrypted if no password was set, or encrypted if a password is set or if we do not have it unencrypted. Setter: Accepts a private key in wallet import format. If the private key is encrypted, the correct Passphrase must have been set, or else an ApplicationException will be thrown.

member.name: T:GridCoinDotNet.Casascius.Bitcoin.KeyPair
member.summary: A KeyPair represents a Bitcoin address and its known private key.
